original_text:
Because of this I will weep and wail;
    I will go about barefoot and naked.
I will howl like a jackal
    and moan like an owl.
korean_text: 이러므로 내가 애통하며 애곡하고 벌거벗은 몸으로 행하며 들개 같이 애곡하고 타조 같이 애통하리니

sentences.original_text: Because of this I will weep and wail
I will go about barefoot and naked
I will howl like a jackal
